experiences.name: Socrata
experiences.title: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Developed automation to launch entire stack on Azure
Implemented Sensu monitoring across physical datacenters and Azure
Drove operational requirements for a major backend replacement - from hardare capacity planning to configuration and deployment on Azure
Co-authored OSS performance testing framework: [client-test](http://github.com/socrata/client-test) and [orthos](http://github.com/socrata/orthos)

Championed mini-projects to reduce developer frustrations, including a couple that are open-sourced: [metadash](http://github.com/socrata/metadash) and [pagerdash](http://github.com/socrata/pagerdash)

experiences.name: Lestanza
experiences.title: Co-creator
experiences.description: [Lestanza](http://lestanza.com) is Spanish CRM web app to facilitate daycare management in Mexico
accomplishments: Designed, implemented, tested, deployed, and maintained a Rails production web app on Heroku leveraging PostgreSQL

experiences.name: Microsoft
experiences.title: Software Design Engineer in Test 2
accomplishments: *System Center Configuration Manager*: Drove software distribution test strategy and security compliance for write filter aware clients
*Windows Core Storage*: Developed Windows 7 storage certification tools relating to SSDs, Storage Controllers, and Data Integrity
*Intern Social Coordinator*: Coordinated and facilitated intern events throughout the summer

experiences.name: Just for fun
experiences.description: I seem to always have a project on the back-burner - often to experiment with new technology
accomplishments: *Lestanza*: Lestanza started in this category, and grew into project with business aspirations
*[PrayerCloud](http://github.com/anowell/prayercloud-web)*: A proof-of-concept app to manage prayer lists; my first stab at Node.js, Express.js, Backbone.js, MongoDB, and even Photoshop
*My Portfolio*: This very portfolio was an excuse to experiment with d3 and parallax design; did I mention it's [data-driven](http://github.com/anowell/portfolio/blob/gh-pages/cv.json)

education.name: Iowa State
